body.name: Cuisinart Air Fryer + Convection Toaster Oven, 8-1 Oven with Bake, Grill, Broil & Warm Options, Stainless Steel, TOA-70
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 3 hrs 1 min
FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 3 hrs 1 min
features: COOKING FUNCTIONS: This premium 1800 watt toaster oven and AirFryer, is equipped with AirFry setting plus toast, convection bake, bake, convection broil, broil, grill, warming feature, with a wide temperature range (Warm-450°F)
CAPACITY: Large enough to toast 6-slices of bread, air fry 3-pounds of chicken wings, bake a 12-inch pizza or roast a 4-pound chicken
SUPERIOR OPERATION: Equipped with an adjustable temperature dial, 60-minute timer/auto-shutoff and a toast shade selector to ensure your meals are cooked to your perfection
INCLUDES: Oven light, oven rack, baking pan, AirFry basket, grill and a nonstick easy-clean interior to make cleanup simple
LIMITED 3-YEAR WARRANTY: Refer to user manual for troubleshooting steps and questions surrounding warranty policies
body.description: Cuisinart’s signature AirFryer just got even better! In addition to AirFrying french fries, baking cookies or warming up your leftovers, now you can make even more delicious meals in your Cuisinart® AirFryer Toaster Oven with Grill! Sear steaks and vegetables on one side and griddle the perfect breakfast on the other with the new dual-sided grill and griddle plate. Bring next-generation cooking to your countertop with the spacious 8-function oven that makes cooking a feast for family and friends — or a simple snack for one — fun, fast, and easy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Extremely difficult to clean
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. No matter what I try the stains don’t go, it’s extremely difficult to clean. I works good but I never want to use it because of the cleaning

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars strong chemical smell
reviews.reviewText: There is a strong plastic smell while using the Cuisinart air fryer, convection, toaster. The cooking cavity has been cleaned thoroughly and inspected for plastic debris. After repeat uses, the strong plastic smell has not dissipated. The smell permeates my home. I've had the Cuisinart for 2 months now and the toxic smell is still just as strong as the first day we used it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Excellent and great value
reviews.reviewText: The grill on this air-fryer is exceptional. Cooks chicken fast and better than my outdoor Traeger. All other functions work well. Easy to use. The dials and inside light are great. Buy it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars This is a great oven, except for one major design flaw.
reviews.reviewText: The spring that keeps the door closed has one small screw that holds it to the door front and it WILL eventually strip out and the door won't close. Unless you can weld the keeper shown in the picture to the door front, you should not buy this product. It needs to be redesigned and the mechanical engineer put in time out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Started smoking less than a year
reviews.reviewText: This model, TOA-7 was purchased in April, 2023. I did lots of research on air fryers prior to purchasing this! Obviously, that didn't return the results I was hoping for. Since that time (now Jan, 2024) I mainly used it for baking a single chicken breast (375°), toast (takes forever) and occasionally the air fryer for fries, some frozen snacks. The convection oven for baking really cuts down cooking time. Now, suddenly the unit is smoking. White smoke fills the interior. I tried cleaning inside thinking it was grease from the chicken? Unit still smokes even when toasting. I called Cuisinart support since this was beyond my return window with Amazon and since this unit is still under warranty (3 yrs), they offered to send out a new unit. Customer service was extremely helpful. Not that I want this unit again, but at least I'm not out $160. I would advise to pass on this unit....

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love results but guesswork on how to tell if the oven is up to recommended temperature. On and timer button are the same? Confusing!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dependable and easy to use
reviews.reviewText: This is the second one I've bought. My son took my first one to college with him. This is a great item! Multifunctional - does so much and very evenly distributes heat. I have noticed I have to keep a close eye when using air fryer or convection, but this is normal for these types of items. Highly recommend!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have wanted a toaster oven for years and had a mini air fryer that worked well but wasn't big enough to cook food for my whole family in, so I decided to buy this to replace it. This looks great, has good instructions, but the performance is lacking. I have tried all the settings and everything takes 2-3x longer to cook then instructions on the packages, and the ovens manual, says they should. The only setting the works like it should is "toast". I'm not sure if I got a bad batch but this was a waste of a lot of money and is now an expensive toaster sitting on my counter.
Had been using this brand before moving to Canada, though not the same model but it remains a very user friendly and reliable device producing fantastic food for us.
Wanted something that could fit under my counter and be a substitute for my oven when we didn’t have anything large to cook. Works like a charm. Got rid of my toaster and my air fryer.
Wife loves it. Isn’t that all that counts.
Fast to heat up, makes excellent toast
